import React from "react"; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; import style from "./cardcss.css"; import CountUp from "react-countup"; const Cardi = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { if (!confirmed) { return "loading..."; } return (
INFECTED Real Date Number of active cases RECOVERED {recovered.value} Real Date Number of recovered cases DEATH {deaths.value} Real Date Number of death cases DEATH {lastUpdate} Real Date Number of death cases
); }; export default Cardi;
